main.name: Bart Cusick
main.description: A Full-Stack Web Developer and Designer with a great imagination. A humorous and open-minded personality has always made it easy to communicate and work with others. Eager to learn, extremely adaptable, and quick to pick up new tasks. Always met customer deadlines. Innovative, imaginative, multimedia oriented and can draw really cool monsters.
